title: [娱乐l综合]btrashbin —— 给玩家一个虚拟的垃圾桶[1.8-1.12]
author: 不死之躯
txt_content:
虚拟垃圾桶




给玩家输送的消息可以定制


配置文件
 #---------------------------#
# Thanks for downloading my #
#         SKRIPT            #
# Credits: BloodBugs        #
#         BTrashBin         #
#---------------------------#

options:

    Prefix: &f[&cLixeira&f] #Here you can change the Prefix
    msg: Você abriu sua lixeira virtual. &cN?o tente guardar itens nela! # Here you can change the message that appears when the player opens the TrashBin

command /trash: #Here you can change the command.
    aliases: /junk, /trashbin #Here you can add or remove aliases.
    trigger:
        open chest with 6 row named "{@Prefix}" to the player 
        send "{@Prefix} {@msg}" 
        
on script load:
    message "+--------------------+" to console
    message " Turning on the Skript" to console
    message " Skript : BTrashBin" to console
    message " Version : 0.1" to console
    message " Author  : BloodBugs" to console
    message "+--------------------+" to console
on script unload:
    message "+--------------------+" to console
    message " Shutting down the Skript" to console
    message " Skript : BTrashBin" to console
    message " Version : 0.1" to console
    message " Author  : BloodBugs" to console
    message "+--------------------+" to console
命令：
/trash - 就可以打开垃圾桶




[groupid=1306]Bone Studio[/groupid]

replies.txt_content: 我记得Ess好像有类似的功能

replies.author: 秋风残叶
replies.txt_content:
fyxrim 发表于 2017-10-31 13:28
不用汉化都可以？
版规没说一定要汉化，版规只说了没汉化的搬运可以二搬

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content:
fyxrim 发表于 2017-10-31 13:28
不用汉化都可以？
w h我汉化了呀，有没有说不许要将插件汉化，是个人都能自行完成的
有什么用吗，直接扔到岩浆、刺上不行吗

不用汉化可以转载么？
